blogPost.excerpt: The real metal finish on the main camera adds unity to the design and accentuates the luxury of the haze texture. It’s an iconic new camera design made to turn heads.
blogPost.body: The real metal finish on the main camera adds unity to the design and accentuates the luxury of the haze texture. It’s an iconic new camera design made to turn heads.
blogPost.title: Samsung Galaxy S21 5G - Samsungs newest range of 5G smartphones
blogPost.author: Aaron  O'Leary

localize.description: 主摄像头上的真金属处理增加了设计的统一性，并突出了雾霾质感的豪华感。这是一款标志性的新相机设计，让人眼前一亮。
localize.tagline: 三星最新的5G智能手机系列。

localize.description: 主攝像頭上的真金屬處理增加了設計的統一性，並突出了霧霾質感的豪華感。這是一款標誌性的新相機設計，讓人眼前一亮。
localize.tagline: 三星最新的5G智能手機系列。

previous.excerpt: The only eCommerce single-click ad spend optimizer. We here at Optily want to help you make the most of the advertising budget you have to work with. Our fees are flat, not based on what you spend, so we’re in it to help you win.
previous.title: Optily - The only eCommerce single-click ad spend optimizer.

localize.description: 唯一的电商单次点击广告花费优化器。在Optily，我们希望帮助您充分利用您的广告预算。我们的收费是统一的，而不是基于您的花费，所以我们是为了帮助您赢。
localize.tagline: 唯一的电商单次点击广告花费优化器。

localize.description: 唯一的電商單次點擊廣告花費優化器。在Optily，我們希望幫助您充分利用您的廣告預算。我們的收費是統一的，而不是基於您的花費，所以我們是爲了幫助您贏。
localize.tagline: 唯一的電商單次點擊廣告花費優化器。

next.excerpt: Drata saves companies hundreds of hours per year getting and staying SOC 2 compliant by continuously monitoring their security posture and automatically collecting evidence of their controls across AWS, GCP, GitHub, Jira, Gusto, G Suite, Office365 and more.
next.title: Drata - Put SOC 2 Compliance on Autopilot

localize.description: Drata通过持续监控其安全态势并自动收集AWS、GCP、GitHub、Jira、Gusto、G Suite、Office365等的控制证据，每年可为公司节省数百小时的时间，以获得并保持SOC 2合规性。
localize.tagline: 将SOC 2合规性置于自动驾驶状态

localize.description: Drata通過持續監控其安全態勢並自動收集AWS、GCP、GitHub、Jira、Gusto、G Suite、Office365等的控制證據，每年可爲公司節省數百小時的時間，以獲得並保持SOC 2合規性。
localize.tagline: 將SOC 2合規性置於自動駕駛狀態
